org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class TooltipItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.GenericJavaScriptObject
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.BaseItem
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.TooltipItem

  • public final class TooltipItem
extends BaseItem
    Contains all info for every item of tooltip.
    Created and passed by CHART.JS.
    It uses into the tooltips callbacks.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    TooltipLabelCallback, TooltipBodyCallback, TooltipItemSortHandler, TooltipFilterHandler, TooltipFooterCallback, TooltipTitleCallback
